summary: Jo lives in the shadow of his older brother. Amidst a world of delinquency, they become interested in illegal car racing. One night they participate in of them, never reaching the finish line. Jo will become Jonathan.
cast: Jean-Sébastien Courchesne|Eliane Gagnon|Raphaël Lacaille|Jean-Alexandre Létourneau|Vanessa Pilon
title: Jo pour Jonathan
